member.summary: Invoked when a chat message is received.

member.summary: Will be invoked from main thread before registered handlers

member.name: E:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerEvents.OnPlayerHandshake
member.summary: Will be invoked from main thread when a client is attempting to connect, use to deny the connection request.

member.name: E:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerEvents.OnPlayerConnected
member.summary: Will be invoked when a player is connected, but this player might not be ready yet(client resources not loaded), using is recommended.

member.name: E:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerEvents.OnPlayerReady
member.summary: Will be invoked after the client connected and all resources(if any) have been loaded.

member.name: E:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerEvents.OnPlayerDisconnected
member.summary: Invoked when a player disconnected, all method won't be effective in this scope.

member.name: E:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerEvents.OnPlayerUpdate
member.summary: Invoked everytime a player's main ped has been updated

member.summary: Send a chat message to all players, use to send to an individual client.

The chat message
The username which send this message (default = "Server")
Weather to raise the event defined in
member.remarks: When is unspecified and is null or unspecified, will be set to true

How to use this message (argsLength required!)

A callback to invoke when the command received.

member.summary: Send an event and data to the specified clients. Use if you want to send event to individual client.

The objects conataing your data, see for supported types.
The target clients to send. Leave it null to send to all clients

member.name: M:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.RegisterCustomEventHandler(System.Int32,System.Action{RageCoop.Server.Scripting.CustomEventReceivedArgs})
member.summary: Register an handler to the specifed event hash, one event can have multiple handlers.
member.param: An unique identifier of the event, you can hash your event name with
An handler to be invoked when the event is received from the server.

member.name: M:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.RegisterCustomEventHandler(System.String,System.Action{RageCoop.Server.Scripting.CustomEventReceivedArgs})
member.summary: Register an event handler for specified event name.
member.param: This value will be hashed to an int to reduce overhead
The handler to be invoked when the event is received

member.name: M:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.FindScript(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Find a script matching the specified type
member.param: The full name of the script's type, e.g. RageCoop.Resources.Discord.Main
Which resource to search for this script. Will search in all loaded resources if unspecified
member.returns: A object reprensenting the script, or if not found.
member.remarks: Explicitly casting the return value to orginal type will case a exception to be thrown due to the dependency isolation mechanism in resource system. You shouldn't reference the target resource assemblies either, since it causes the referenced assembly to be loaded and started in your resource.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.Logger
member.summary: Get a that the server is currently using, you should use to display resource-specific information.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the client that is resposible for synchronizing time and weather

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.API.LoadedResources
member.summary: Get all currently loaded as a dictionary indexed by their names
member.remarks: Accessing this property from script constructor is stronly discouraged since other scripts and resources might have yet been loaded. Accessing from is not recommended either. Although all script assemblies will have been loaded to memory and instantiated, invocation of other scripts are not guaranteed.

member.name: T:RageCoop.Server.Scripting.ServerScript
member.summary: Inherit from this class, constructor will be called automatically, but other scripts might have yet been loaded and will be null, you should use . to initiate your script.

member.summary: This method would be called from listener thread after all scripts have been loaded.

member.summary: This method would be called from listener thread when the server is shutting down, you MUST terminate all background jobs/threads in this method.

member.name: T:RageCoop.Server.Settings
member.summary: Settings for RageCoop Server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.Port
member.summary: Port to listen for incoming connections

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.MaxPlayers
member.summary: Maximum number of players on this server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.MaxLatency
member.summary: Maximum latency allowed for a client, a client will be kicked if it's latency it's higher than this value

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.Name
member.summary: The server name to be shown on master server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.Website
member.summary: The website address to be shown on master server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.Description
member.summary: The description to be shown on master server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.GameMode
member.summary: The game mode to be shown on master server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.Language
member.summary: The language to be shown on master server

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.WelcomeMessage
member.summary: The message to send when a client connected (not visible to others)

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.AnnounceSelf
member.summary: Whether or not to announce this server so it'll appear on server list.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.MasterServer
member.summary: Master server address, mostly doesn't need to be changed.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.LogLevel
member.summary: See .

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.NpcStreamingDistance
member.summary: NPC data won't be sent to a player if their distance is greater than this value. -1 for unlimited.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.PlayerStreamingDistance
member.summary: Player's data won't be sent to another player if their distance is greater than this value. -1 for unlimited.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.WeatherTimeSync
member.summary: If enabled, all clients will have same weather and time as host

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.AllowedUsernameChars
member.summary: List of all allowed username characters

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.UseP2P
member.summary: Whether to use direct connection between players to send entity information, needs to be enabled if on WAN for this feature to function properly.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.UseZeroTier
member.summary: Whether to enable zerotier VLAN functionality, allowing you to host a server behind NAT firewall, no port forward required.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.UseVoice
member.summary: Use in-game voice chat to communicate with other players

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.ZeroTierNetworkID
member.summary: The zerotier network id to join, default value is zerotier's public Earth network.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.AutoUpdate
member.summary: Automatically update to nightly build when an update is avalible, check is performed every 10 minutes.

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.KickGodMode
member.summary: Kick godmode assholes

member.name: P:RageCoop.Server.Settings.KickSpamming
member.summary: Kick spamming assholes
